00128 NIVisumTL::NIVisumTL(const std::string& Name, SUMOTime CycleTime,
00129                      SUMOTime IntermediateTime, bool PhaseDefined)
00130     : myName(Name), myCycleTime(CycleTime), myIntermediateTime(IntermediateTime),
00131       myPhaseDefined(PhaseDefined) {}
00132 
00133 NIVisumTL::~NIVisumTL() {
00134     for (NIVisumTL::PhaseMap::iterator i = myPhases.begin();
00135             i != myPhases.end(); i++) {
00136         delete(i->second);
00137     }
00138     for (NIVisumTL::SignalGroupMap::iterator k = mySignalGroups.begin();
00139             k != mySignalGroups.end(); k++) {
00140         delete(k->second);
00141     }
00142 }

00186 void NIVisumTL::AddSignalGroup(const std::string Name, SUMOTime StartTime, SUMOTime EndTime) {
00187     mySignalGroups[Name] = new NIVisumTL::SignalGroup(Name, StartTime, EndTime);
00188 }
00189 
00190 void NIVisumTL::AddPhase(const std::string Name, SUMOTime StartTime, SUMOTime EndTime) {
00191     myPhases[Name] = new NIVisumTL::Phase(StartTime, EndTime);
00192 }
00193 
00194 NIVisumTL::SignalGroup* NIVisumTL::GetSignalGroup(const std::string Name) {
00195     return (*mySignalGroups.find(Name)).second;
00196 }
00197 
00198 void
00199 NIVisumTL::build(NBTrafficLightLogicCont& tlc) {
00200     for (NodeVector::iterator ni = myNodes.begin(); ni != myNodes.end(); ni++) {
00201         NBNode* Node = (*ni);
00202         NBLoadedTLDef* def = new NBLoadedTLDef(Node->getID(), Node);
00203         tlc.insert(def);
00204         def->setCycleDuration((unsigned int) myCycleTime);
00205         // signalgroups
00206         for (SignalGroupMap::iterator gi = mySignalGroups.begin(); gi != mySignalGroups.end(); gi++) {
00207             std::string GroupName = (*gi).first;
00208             NIVisumTL::SignalGroup& SG = *(*gi).second;
00209             def->addSignalGroup(GroupName);
00210             def->addToSignalGroup(GroupName, *SG.GetConnections());
00211             def->setSignalYellowTimes(GroupName, myIntermediateTime, myIntermediateTime);
00212             // phases
00213             if (myPhaseDefined) {
00214                 for (PhaseMap::iterator pi = SG.GetPhases()->begin(); pi != SG.GetPhases()->end(); pi++) {
00215                     NIVisumTL::Phase& PH = *(*pi).second;
00216                     def->addSignalGroupPhaseBegin(GroupName, PH.GetStartTime(), NBTrafficLightDefinition::TLCOLOR_GREEN);
00217                     def->addSignalGroupPhaseBegin(GroupName, PH.GetEndTime(), NBTrafficLightDefinition::TLCOLOR_RED);
00218                 };
00219             } else {
00220                 def->addSignalGroupPhaseBegin(GroupName, SG.GetStartTime(), NBTrafficLightDefinition::TLCOLOR_GREEN);
00221                 def->addSignalGroupPhaseBegin(GroupName, SG.GetEndTime(), NBTrafficLightDefinition::TLCOLOR_RED);
00222             }
00223         }
00224     }
00225 }
